path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Hora Os Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows the owner to mint an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is accessible without any restrictions, allowing unauthorized users to create new tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function is not protected by any modifiers or access control mechanisms.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The _approve function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes in contract ownership.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The transferOwnership function has onlyOwner modifier but it's still vulnerable as it can be called by the owner without any protection mechanism.
